channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Heartbroken
item.description: TL;DR: My heart is broken. Less shitposting. More thinking. Hopefully something productive, soon.

item.title: Firefox Test Pilot: The Flattening
item.description: TL;DR: Firefox Test Pilot is becoming a statically-generated site from content in flat files. We're moving away from Django and PostgreSQL, and it's been a bit of a journey.

item.title: Poking the Mongo on Pico-8
item.description: TL;DR: I started writing a video game for a fantasy console. The future is weird.

item.title: On the Yak Shaving Habits of a Writer
item.description: TL;DR: Writing is apparently so important to me that I procrastinate like crazy rather than risk failing at it.

item.title: Making of the GameChord
item.description: TL;DR: I made a USB keypad that's good for gaming and typing entirely with one hand.

item.title: How I learned to love spreadsheets in space
item.description: TL;DR: I thought it would be fun to fly internet space ships. Instead, it's proven more satisfying to write software and make internet space money.

item.title: Building a USB controller for an IBM Model M
item.description: TL;DR: I wired up a Teensy 2.0++ to an IBM Model M keyboard, which gave it a USB interface and custom firmware that can remap keys and do other interesting things.

item.title: Keyboard hacking seems like fun
item.description: TL;DR: I think I've caught the DIY keyboard hacking bug, and I'll probably end up building something weird.

item.title: Review: Steam Controller
item.description: TL;DR: The Steam Controller is an odd little duck. But, I'm rooting for it.
